channel.title: Bill on HeaterTips
channel.description: Recent content in Bill on HeaterTips

item.title: Electricity Usage of Oil-Filled Heaters: The Ultimate Guide
item.description: The ultimate guide on the electricity usage on oil heaters. With a look up diagram to find your exact costs to run an oil heater and plenty efficiency tips.

item.title: 21 Cheapest Ways to Heat a Room & House
item.description: Here are the 21 cheapest methods to heat a room. Most tips don't even require a central heating or electricity.
